uploads.title: Upload Management
uploads.subtitle: Monitor folders and manage content uploads

queueDashboard.title: Upload Queue Dashboard
queueDashboard.noActiveJobDescription: Queue is empty. Upload files or scan monitored folders to begin processing.
queueDashboard.noQueuedJobsDescription: All files have been processed. Add more files to continue.
queueDashboard.noRecentCompletedDescription: Successfully uploaded files will appear here.

manualUpload.title: Manual Upload
manualUpload.subtitle: Upload files directly from your device
manualUpload.contentTypeHelp: Select the type of content being uploaded
manualUpload.dropZoneAriaLabel: File upload dropzone. Click or press Enter to select files, or drag files here
manualUpload.dropHere: Drag video files here or click to browse
manualUpload.supportedFormats: Supported: MP4, MKV, AVI, MOV, WEBM (max {{maxSize}})
manualUpload.fileListEmptyDescription: Use the file selector above to choose files for upload
manualUpload.removeFileHint: Remove this file from upload queue
manualUpload.clearAllHint: Remove all files from upload queue

urlUpload.title: Import from URL
urlUpload.subtitle: Import video files from remote URLs
urlUpload.urlHelp: Enter a direct URL to a video file
urlUpload.emptyUrlListDescription: Enter URLs above to import video files from remote sources

monitoredFolders.title: Monitored Folders
monitoredFolders.subtitle: Configure folders to automatically detect and upload content
monitoredFolders.noFoldersDescription: Add folders to enable automatic content detection and upload
monitoredFolders.scanFolderHint: Check folder for new files and queue uploads
monitoredFolders.noFilesFound: No new files found in folder
monitoredFolders.confirmDeleteMessage: This will stop monitoring this folder. Existing uploads will not be affected.

form.title: Folder Configuration
form.name: Folder Name
form.pathHelp: Enter the full path to monitor
form.pathReadOnly: Path cannot be changed after creation
form.enabledHelp: Enable or disable monitoring for this folder
form.autoUploadHelp: Automatically upload new files detected in this folder
form.contentTypeHelp: Type of content in this folder

dryRun.title: Dry Run Mode
dryRun.description: Preview upload without actually transferring files
dryRun.descriptionDetailed: When enabled, files will be validated and metadata extracted, but not uploaded to storage. Use this to test uploads without committing changes.
dryRun.toggleHint: Toggle dry run mode for safe upload testing
dryRun.previewDescription: Review what will happen if you proceed with upload
dryRun.proceedHint: Disable dry run and perform actual upload

connectionStatus.connectionLostDescription: The connection to the server was lost. Attempting to reconnect...
connectionStatus.connectionLostAnnouncement: Connection lost. Real-time updates paused. Use Refresh button for manual updates.
connectionStatus.connectedAnnouncement: Connected to upload service. Real-time updates active.
connectionStatus.reconnectingAnnouncement: Reconnecting to upload service. Attempt {{attempt}} of {{maxAttempts}}.

actions.clearQueueConfirmMessage: This will cancel {{count}} pending upload(s). This action cannot be undone.
actions.triggerUploadHint: Scan all monitored folders for new files

errors.loadFailedDescription: Unable to fetch upload queue. Please try refreshing.
errors.saveFailedDescription: Unable to save monitored folder. Please try again.
errors.uploadFailedDescription: One or more files failed to upload. Check the file list for details.
errors.pathTraversal: Path contains invalid characters or traversal attempts
errors.networkError: Network error. Please check your connection.
errors.authError: Authentication error. Please log in again.
errors.serverError: Server error. Please try again later.
errors.duplicateFile: This file has already been uploaded
errors.rateLimitExceeded: Rate limit exceeded. Please wait before uploading more files.
errors.configValidationFailed: Configuration validation failed. Check console for details.
errors.unsupportedBrowser: Your browser doesn't support required features

mobile.dataWarning: You're on cellular data. Uploading {{size}} may use significant data.
mobile.lowMemoryWarning: Device memory is low. Large uploads may fail.
mobile.batteryLowWarning: Battery is low ({{percent}}%). Uploads may be interrupted.
mobile.mobileBrowserNotSupported: Some features may not work on mobile browsers

accessibility.pageDescription: Upload management interface with queue monitoring, manual uploads, and folder monitoring

shortcuts.uploadFocused: Upload input focused. Press Enter to select files.
